## Simple Observable Slider

The slider is created using `Inputs.range`. The `viewof` keyword makes the result a reactive variable.

```{ojs}
// Define the reactive slider variable named 'sliderValue'
viewof sliderValue = Inputs.range(
  [0, 100], // The minimum and maximum range of the slider
  {
    value: 50, // The initial value
    step: 1,   // The increment/decrement step
    label: "Select a Value (0-100)"
  }
)
```
